name: REVIEWGUESSR
description:
GUESS THE RATINGS OF REAL HOTEL REVIEWS!

This was a game-jam-esque project I worked on over the last few months, so please don't expect it to be perfectly polished! I know it's rough around the edges and a bit ugly in places, but it was a fun enough idea that I figured it was worth releasing for 99p.

FEATURES: 

- Guess the ratings of almost infinite real reviews!

- Listen to a funny robot voice read out each and every one!

- Go for a highscore over five rounds! If you get it bang on in the last round, you get an extra go, so there's no limit to how high your score can go!

- Share the funniest reviews you find on social media with an easy to use share button that instantly copies a screenshot to your clipboard!

- If you're a  streamer, you can even play against your chat in Chat V.S Streamer mode! Does your chat know reviews better than you? (NOTE: When entering your username the input IS case sensitive!)

IMPORTANT TO NOTE BEFORE PURCHASING: This game searches online to find real reviews. If the places it searches change the way their websites work, the game may break. If this happens I will try my best to fix it, but if for some reason I can’t I cannot offer refunds (hence me choosing to make the game very cheap!). If the hopefully unlikely chance of you losing your 99p on a broken game bothers you, I completely understand and would recommend you do not purchase at this time. Otherwise, I hope you enjoy!
